text: Robert Allen "Rob" Riggle (born April 21, 1970) is an American actor, comedian and former United States Marine Officer. He is perhaps best known for his work as a correspondent on Comedy Central's The Daily Show from 2006 to 2008, as a cast member on Saturday Night Live from 2004 to 2005, and for his roles in movies such as The Hangover, The Other Guys, Let's Be Cops, Dumb & Dumber To, 21 Jump Street, 22 Jump Street, The Goods: Live Hard, Sell Hard, and Step Brothers. He was born in Louisville, Kentucky. His family moved to Overland Park, Kansas, when he was two. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Kentucky Category:Actors from Louisville, Kentucky Category:Actors from Kansas Category:People from Overland Park, Kansas
title: Rob Riggle
